Which among the following is correct about ROM?
options: ROM is nonvolatile memory because any data stored in ROM remains there, even if the power is turned off
ROM is volatile memory because any data stored in ROM are lost if the power is turned off
answer: ROM is nonvolatile memory because any data stored in ROM remains there, even if the power is turned off
